The scene switches to a boy and a woman standing in a kitchen. The kitchen has a white refrigerator and a white and wooden table. The boy is wearing a blue, white, and red shirt, red shorts, and black shoes. The woman, wearing a white coat and white inner layer, with long blonde hair and stylish glasses, is wiping a cup at the kitchen counter and looks up at the boy. The boy quickly hides the red bottle behind his back.
